mapper.insert: insert into member(memIdx,memID, memPassword, memName, memAge, memGender, memEmail, memProfile) values((select IFNULL(MAX(memIdx)+1, 1) from member mem), #{memID}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memAge}, #{memGender}, #{memEmail}, #{memProfile})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN auth auth on mem.mem_id = auth.mem_id where mem.mem_id = #{mem_id}

mapper.update: update member set memProfile = #{memProfile} where memID = #{memID}
